Text:
hi guys.. thanks a ton "tvteam" for uploading the uefa euro 2012 matches...really can't thank u enough...jst 1 request don't stop now....

plz plz plz upload the rest of the games like italy vs croatia match and plz plz continue uploading all the games...it is a humble request..i've been for u to upload those games for a couple of days now...nd i'm sure there are plenty like me who are waiting for u to upload them...so plz upload them as quickly as u guys can 

thx again guys....shall be waiting..u guys r the best...keep up the great work...lots of love & thx :))
Thank you, friend. Keep doing this awesome job.
